document.full_text: canadian eyes will again be focused on the city of vancouver where the canucks are heading into the stanley cup playoffs with the best shot at bringing hockey's holy grail back to the hockey-mad nation.
document.title: canucks favored to bring stanley cup home to canada
lines_and_colors: canadian eyes will again be focused on the city of vancouver where the canucks are heading into the stanley cup playoffs with the best shot at bringing hockey's holy grail back to the hockey-mad nation.
